text:
e="preserve">Otto Barić (; 19 June 1933 – 13 December 2020) was an Austrian-born Croatian football player and later manager. He was born in Eisenkappel-Vellach, Austria. From 1958 to 1963, he played for Lokomotiva Zagreb. He managed the national team from 2002 to 2004.
Barić died of COVID-19 on 13 December 2020 in Zagreb, Croatia at the age of 87.
